```verilog
module TopModule (
    input logic [7:0] in,     // 8-bit signed input
    output logic [31:0] out   // 32-bit signed output
);

always @(*) begin
    out = { {24{in[7]}}, in };  // Sign-extend the input
end

endmodule
```
